entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test failure: Wasm.Build.Tests.NativeBuildTests.MonoAOTCross_WorksWithNoTrimming #93522
  • CultureInfo.GetCultures returns nothing on iOS platforms with HybridGlobalization enabled #93514
  • [API Proposal]: Math float vectorized functions for Vector64/128/256/512 and Vector2/3/4 #93513
  • [AOT] Add support for compressing output file #93510
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/AssertionPropagation/ArrBoundElim/ArrBoundElim.dll #93508
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/ConstantFolding/value_numbering_checked_arithmetic_with_constants_ro/value_numbering_checked_arithmetic_with_constants_ro.dll #93506
    8.0.0
  • Awaiting nongeneric Task.WhenAll changes behavior in .NET 8 to throw the last exception instead of the first #93504
  • Accessing folded conversion of string literals to UTF-8 from user code is problematic. #93501
    Future
  • Fix regression or document breaking change in BinaryReader #93500
    9.0.0
  • JIT: check-debug diffs in windows arm64 SPMI #93499
    9.0.0
  • ConfigurationBinder source generator encounters namespace conflicts in using statements #93498
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add protected factory methods for creating Label and LocalBuilder in ILGenerator #93497
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Memory leak in ContextMenuStrip with ToolStripMenuItem submenus #93520
  • [NativeAOT] set StaticICULinking results in a CmakeLists.txt that violates policy CMP0000 of Cmake (affects CMake version >= 3.9.0) #93436
  • Unexpected results in LINQs ExceptBy #93512
  • Repo tag for v7.0.12 is for v7.0.11 #93328
  • IHostedService.StopAsync(...) not called when SIGTERM issued on ACA #91926
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Workaround for #93442 #93523
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Optimize constant range tests #93521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Api append all bytes 84532 #93519
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Provide System.DirectoryServices.Protocols package readme #93518
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Fix potential 'Floating Point Exception' with speculative execution #93517
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Memory.Data package readme #93516
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Simplify surrogate handling logic in WebUtlity #93515
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] TcpReceiveSendGetsCanceledByDispose: update test for change in Linux kernel. #93505
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [release/8.0] TcpReceiveSendGetsCanceledByDispose: update test for change in Linux kernel. #93502
    area-System.Net.Sockets

Merged

  • Use Ascii transcoding APIs in more places in System.Net.Http #93511
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • (chore) set min version of cmake in native CmakeLists.txt to surpass Cmake CMP0000 policy warning #93437
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Disable value_numbering_checked_arithmetic_with_constants_ro #93507
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2291029 #93496
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NativeAOT] Miscellaneous cleanup #93446
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve EH dead code elimination #93428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Make FailFast blocks cold (GS cookies) #93429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use `add_link_options` and `target_link_options` in cmake #92844
    area-Infrastructure
  • Enable Adding Disabled Tests Skip Reason to their XML Results Log From issues.targets #93492
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] refactor entropy #93466
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Vector512 Support for Enumerable<int>.Min/Max #93369
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Reflection type refactoring #93440
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make changes nescessary to build IL asm grammar with Bison. #89704
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Interpreter automatic PGO #92981
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
